title: Migrate STT to Naver Clova
description: Google STT diarization failed in independent tests; plan to migrate STT pipeline to Naver Clova. Update docs/specs/STT_MIGRATION_CLOVA.md with migration plan and validate via test scripts.

title: STT temp audio file lifecycle management
description: Add lifecycle management for audio artifacts: Supabase chunk cleanup after merge, GCS temp object deletion after STT completes or fails, and optional local temp file cleanup policies. Document retention policy.

title: Evaluate STT diarization model/min-max tuning
description: Validate diarization accuracy with model variants (latest_long vs telephony) and adjust min/max speaker counts based on Korean data. Consider making model configurable via env.

title: STT: Local worker to merge chunks and upload to GCS
description: Implement local worker service to download Supabase chunks, merge/remux into a single file (ffmpeg), upload to GCS, and return gs:// URI.

title: GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY in worker .env contains concatenated NEXT_PUBLIC_GEMINI_API_KEY
description: Worker env shows NEXT_PUBLIC_GEMINI_API_KEY appended to GOOGLE_PRIVATE_KEY on same line, corrupting PEM and causing auth failures. Ensure .env formatting keeps keys on separate lines.

title: STT worker token auth verification and local dev test plan
description: Document and verify STT_START_URL/local dev flow: ensure STT_WORKER_TOKEN is set in .env.local and worker .env, worker calls localhost /api/stt/start, and /api/stt/start returns JSON (200/401) without login redirects. Add quick test steps for npm run dev and docker worker.

title: STT worker start calls redirect to /login without token auth
description: Worker POSTs to /api/stt/start but middleware redirects to /login, returning HTML and breaking JSON parsing. Add token-based auth or middleware exemption and update docs.

title: STT diarization/underscore debug instrumentation
description: Added STT_DEBUG instrumentation in /api/stt/status and /api/stt/complete to log speakerTag distribution, word counts, underscore occurrences, and word samples for diagnosing diarization/underscore issues.

title: STT: Supabase Storage bucket + signed upload URL endpoint
description: Create Supabase Storage bucket for audio uploads and implement server action/route to mint signed upload URLs (supports large files).

title: GCS bucket IAM missing storage.objects.create for dialoguelab-stt-service
description: STT worker fails to upload merged file: 403 storage.objects.create denied. Grant Storage Object Creator (or Admin if delete needed) to dialoguelab-stt-service@gen-lang-client-0709511898.iam.gserviceaccount.com on target bucket.

title: STT: longRunningRecognize start + status polling endpoints
description: Add server endpoints to start Google STT longRunningRecognize using gs:// URI and to poll operation status; persist results into transcripts.

title: STT: Client direct upload (resumable/chunk) + progress UI
description: Update audio recorder/upload flow to send large files directly to Supabase Storage (resumable or chunked) and show upload progress + processing state.

title: STT diarization config + retry handling documented
description: Document diarizationConfig + enableWordTimeOffsets, and implement related code changes: /api/stt/start config update and worker supabase retry/backoff for fetch failures.

title: STT: GCS temp file cleanup + failure recovery
description: Ensure temporary GCS objects are deleted after STT completion/failure; add retry/recovery handling for upload and merge failures.

title: Wire Clova STT results into app pipeline
description: Update /api/stt/start and /api/stt/complete to consume Clova result payload and map segments into transcripts/session creation. Ensure longform client flow works without Google STT operations.
